Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Maevia is the broodmother of the arachnens, and the arachnen population is exploding.

Kill the arachnen scourge, {@LinkCreature:54#3001#Maevia}, and collect her fang as proof.

Report to Gillian at Scythera Fae when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
